duties_responsibilities.duty: Intercepting and assisting or driving technical escalations that come to the executive level in engineering.

Talking with executive levels at customers, delivering among other things, discussion about the situation, explaining the root cause or progress toward it, providing status internally and addressing technical questions during customer interactions.
Understanding escalation process, identifying areas of gaps, and working on improvements in existing processes.
Working with internal support teams, service delivery teams, and account teams to provide solutions to critical customer situations.
Supporting & driving customer get well plans.
Supporting, debugging, and break fixing any issues collaborating with internal engineering teams.
Coordinating day-to-day problem, issue resolution and ensuring timely resolution of issues.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in IT or equivalent technical graduation (Master's preferred)
